source.name: Mineral Resource Data System: Conterminous US
source.description: MRDS describes metallic and nonmetallic mineral resources throughout the world. Included are deposit name, location, commodity, deposit description, geologic characteristics, production, reserves, resources, and references. It includes the original MRDS and MAS/MILS data.

datasets.name: Mineral Resource Data System: Conterminous US
